qa.name: Sherlock Paws
qa.essence: Witty and observant talking dog detective
qa.appearance: Golden Retriever with a deerstalker hat

json_to_edit.voice_over: In a city where humans were baffled, it took a four-legged sleuth to unravel the truth.
json_to_edit.description: Sherlock Paws investigates a mysterious disappearance at the city park.
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Children playing, birds chirping, distant traffic
json_to_edit.name: Park Mystery
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Talking dog detective Sherlock Paws investigates a peculiar case at the city park.

qa.action: A panoramic view of the bustling city park on a sunny day.

hf.action: Sherlock Paws enters the park, his nose twitching as he picks up a scent.

tr.action: Sherlock's eyes narrow as he spots something suspicious near a bush.

xc.action: Sherlock Paws addresses a group of confused park-goers, explaining his findings.

ka.action: Following Sherlock as he races across the park, hot on the trail of a clue.

fn.action: Sherlock examines a discarded note, his paw holding it steady.

af.action: Sherlock Paws stands proudly, having solved the mystery, as onlookers cheer.

edit_command: Add one more shot to the scene.

qa.action: A panoramic view of the bustling city park on a sunny day.

hf.action: Sherlock Paws enters the park, his nose twitching as he picks up a scent.

tr.action: Sherlock's eyes narrow as he spots something suspicious near a bush.

xc.action: Sherlock Paws addresses a group of confused park-goers, explaining his findings.

ka.action: Following Sherlock as he races across the park, hot on the trail of a clue.

zp.action: Through Sherlock's eyes, we see a half-buried collar with a strange symbol, a vital clue in the case.

af.action: Sherlock Paws stands proudly, having solved the mystery, as onlookers cheer.

label.rationale:
we can add one more shot to the scene as requested. to do this, we'll need to update the "number_of_shots" field, add a new entry to the "shots" dictionary, and update the "list_display_order" for the shots. we'll create a new shot that fits well with the existing scene, adding depth to the investigation. here's how we'll proceed:

1. increase "number_of_shots" from "7" to "8".
2. create a new shot with a random two-letter key (let's use "zp").
3. add this new shot to the "shots" dictionary.
4. update the "list_display_order" to include the new shot.

the new shot will be a pov (point of view) shot from sherlock paws' perspective, showing him discovering a crucial piece of evidence. this will add tension and progress to the investigation.

value.action: Through Sherlock's eyes, we see a half-buried collar with a strange symbol, a vital clue in the case.
